diagram:
@startuml
actor Patient
actor Doctor
actor Administrator
rectangle HospitalManagementSystem {
    usecase "Register Patient" as UC1
    usecase "Schedule Appointment" as UC2
    usecase "View Medical Records" as UC3
    usecase "Manage Medications" as UC4
    usecase "Generate Reports" as UC5
    usecase "Manage Staff" as UC6
}
Patient --> UC1
Patient --> UC3
Doctor --> UC2
Doctor --> UC4
Administrator --> UC5
Administrator --> UC6
UC1 .> UC3 : <<include>>
UC2 .> UC4 : <<include>>
UC5 ..> UC6 : <<extend>>
@enduml
raw_diagram:
@startuml
actor Patient
actor Doctor
actor Administrator

rectangle HospitalManagementSystem {
    usecase "Register Patient" as UC1
    usecase "Schedule Appointment" as UC2
    usecase "View Medical Records" as UC3
    usecase "Manage Medications" as UC4
    usecase "Generate Reports" as UC5
    usecase "Manage Staff" as UC6
}

Patient --> UC1
Patient --> UC3
Doctor --> UC2
Doctor --> UC4
Administrator --> UC5
Administrator --> UC6

UC1 .> UC3 : <<include>>
UC2 .> UC4 : <<include>>
UC5 ..> UC6 : <<extend>>
@enduml
